Item ID19955

The Shayzien scarf is a possible reward from elite Treasure Trails. It can be stored in a treasure chest within a player-owned house's costume room. It has no bonuses and is purely cosmetic.

[[File:Shayzien scarf detail.png|left|100px]]
The '''Shayzien scarf''' is a possible reward from [[Clue scroll (elite)|elite]] [[Treasure Trail]]s. It can be stored in a [[treasure chest]] within a [[player-owned house]]'s [[Costume Room|costume room]]. It has no bonuses and is purely cosmetic.
